sn35.60:3.1: 60. Sabbupādānapariññāsutta
sn35.60:4.3: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, sabbupādānapariññāya dhammo?*
sn35.60:4.4: Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṃ.
sn35.60:4.7: Evaṃ passaṃ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako cakkhusmimpi nibbindati, rūpesupi nibbindati, cakkhuviññāṇepi nibbindati, cakkhusamphassepi nibbindati, vedanāyapi nibbindati.
sn35.60:4.10: vimokkhā ‘pariññātaṃ me upādānan’ti pajānāti.
sn35.60:4.15: manañca paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati manoviññāṇaṃ.
sn35.60:4.18: Evaṃ passaṃ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako manasmimpi nibbindati, dhammesupi nibbindati, manoviññāṇepi nibbindati, manosamphassepi nibbindati, vedanāyapi nibbindati.
